  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_82374</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82374</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Communication par satellite</string>
            <string language="en">Satellite communication</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbindung über Satellit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma comunicação satellite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Telecomunicazione via satellite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δορυφορική επικοινωνία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comunicación basada en los satélites</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre l'échange des  micro-ondes entre le matériel de transmission sur terre et un  satellite satellisant la terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the exchange of microwaves between communication equipment on Earth and a satellite orbiting the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le matériel de transmission</string>
            <string language="en">communication equipment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">micro-ondes</string>
            <string language="en">Microwaves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">satellites</string>
            <string language="en">Satellites</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Austausch von 
Mikrowellen zwischen Kommunikation Ausrüstung auf Masse und einem 
Satelliten, die Masse in Umlauf bringend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a troca das microondas 
entre o equipamento de comunicação na terra e um satellite orbitando
a terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra lo scambio di 
microonde fra le attrezzature di comunicazione su terra e un satellite
orbitando intorno alla terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την ανταλλαγή των 
μικροκυμάτων μεταξύ του εξοπλισμού επικοινωνίας στη γη και ενός 
δορυφόρου που βάζει τη γη σε τροχιά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el intercambio de 
microondas entre el equipo de comunicación en la tierra y un basado 
en los satélites moviendo en órbita alrededor de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kommunikation Ausrüstung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikrowellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Satelliten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">equipamento de comunicação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Microondas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Satélites</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">apparecchiatura di comunicazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Microonde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Satelliti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξοπλισμός επικοινωνίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μικροκύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δορυφόροι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">equipo de comunicación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Microondas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Satélites</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
